mapper.select: select * from devops_host_app dha where dha.host_id = #{hostId} order by dha.creation_date desc

select dha.*, dh.name as host_name, dhai.app_id, dhai.code, dhai.source_type, dhai.source_config, dhai.pre_command, dhai.run_command, dhai.post_command, dhai.kill_command, dhai.health_prob, dhai.ready, dhai.group_id, dhai.artifact_id, dhai.version, dhai.id as instanceId from devops_host_app dha left join devops_host dh ON dh.id = dha.host_id left join devops_host_app_instance dhai on dhai.app_id = dha.id where dha.id = #{id}
